revised_title: Van der Waals Dispersion Forces: A Simple Treatment and Applications
tldr: This article presents a simple treatment of van der Waals dispersion forces using classical electrostatics and quantum mechanics. The author derives expressions for the forces between macroscopic bodies and considers the effects of adsorbed surface layers. Approximate expressions are given for non-retarded dispersion forces in terms of refractive indices and absorption frequencies of materials. The results are useful for calculating van der Waals forces in colloidal and biological systems.
